fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Trade, Business and Industry, Environment, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Research and innovation, Public Health, Food Safety, Transport
eu_initiatives: PNA has been actively following the drafting and implementation of EU Regulation 98/2013 on the marketing and use of explosives precursors. Last year, new fertilizer regulation has been also discussed with other industry associations. More generally, in keeping with its mission, PNA follows the EU’s work in the area of safety, security, trade, environment and public health issues related with fertilizers, agriculture and the chemical industry.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
The mission of the PNA is two-fold: 
•    To develop and promote the agronomic and economic advantages of potassium nitrate in appropriate crop production systems throughout the world.  
•    To support and represent potassium nitrate producers in relevant industry bodies, and in relevant official government bodies around the world with respect to regulations on potassium nitrate, related to safety (transport, storage), security (misuse, terrorism) and human health.
relevant_communication: PNA is maintaining a web site (http://www.kno3.org/) surveying current developments concerning potassium nitrate
